title: Grab These Top Caribbean Travel Deals for July...
text:
July 2015 Caribbean Travel Deals Save money with these awesome hotel, airline and destination offers Sign Up for our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in! Planning a Caribbean vacation? Great new travel deals pop up almost every day -- here's the best we've found for you this month! Capella Resort, St. Lucia. © Capella Resorts 
The Capella resort in St. Lucia welcomes guests to the island's annual Carnival, July 15-21, with a package that includes: seven nights in a standard room or suite welcome by Capella Personal Assistant at airport on arrival, followed by a welcome beverage and personalized check-in full breakfast daily in the resort’s signature The Grill at 14*61 restaurant access to a team of Capella Personal Assistants who can arrange activities prior to your arrival and during your stay water taxi transfers between Marigot Bay and Castries on July 20 and July 21 for Carnival The package is available from July 1-31, with a minimum of a seven nights stay. 2. 20 Percent Off at The Marker Waterfront Resort in Key West 
The new Marker Waterfront Resort Key West , located at the Key West Historic Seaport and Marina, is offering 20 percent off rooms, with rates starting at $199 per night (plus a $25 daily resort fee). Advance payment required for the ‘Last Minute Luxury,' and no refunds will be given. 
To book the offer, call 844-391-5655 . 
Abaco Beach Resort and Boat Harbour Marina 's Aqua-venture package will get you out on the waters of the Bahamas with: accommodations in an ocean view room for four nights welcome cocktail, plus dinner for two at Angler’s Restaurant a center console boat for two days (guide and fuel not included) daily breakfast complimentary use of non-motorized water sporting equipment and fitness facilities 
The package starts at $246 per person, per night, based on double occupancy. Kids ages 12 years or younger stay and eat free. Additional nights start at $129 per person, per night. Deal is valid July 15-Dec. 15. For additional information or reservations, call 1-800-533-4799 or visit www.abacobeachresort.com . Pink beach umbrella at Ocean Club Resorts. © Ocean Club Resorts 4. Spa Credits at Ocean Club Resorts, Turks & Caicos 
Looking for a Caribbean spa getaway? Stay between now and Aug. 30 or between Oct. 3 and Dec. 18, 2015, for four to six nights at the Ocean Club Resorts in Providenciales, Turks & Caicos , and you'll receive credits at Spa Tropique. Book four nights and earn $50 toward spa treatments; stay five nights and receive $75, or six nights and get $100 in spa credit. 
Reservations must be booked directly with the hotel's U.S. reservation office. One spa credit per reservation. Use code “Global Wellness” when booking: 800-457-8787 or www.oceanclubresorts.com . 
Pool at the Alexandra Resort in Turks and Caicos. © Alexandra Resort 5. Prepay for Great Rates at Three Provo Resorts 
The Turks and Caicos Collection, consisting of Alexandra Resort , Beach House , and Blue Haven Resort and Marina on Providenciales, Turks and Caicos , has a flexible summer and fall “Prepay and Save” offer: choose any special on the Collection’s website, book and prepay in full at least 21 days prior to arrival, and you'll save an additional 10 percent off already discounted rates. 
The offer is valid for travel until Oct. 31, 2015 at Alexandra Resort and Beach House, and until Dec. 18, 2015, at Blue Haven Resort. San Juan Marriott Resort, Puerto Rico. © Marriott Hotels and Resorts 6. Marriott Caribbean Dangles 30 Percent Off Leisure Rates 
More than a dozen Marriott resorts in the Caribbean have cut their leisure rates by 30 percent for summer and fall stays. The Marriott 'Time is Money' promotion applies to stays between Aug. 15 and Dec. 19 and must be booked at July 31. 
Participating hotel properties include: 
· Aruba Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino 
· JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa 
· CasaMagna Marriott Cancun Resort 
· Curacao Marriott Beach Resort & Emerald Casino 
· Grand Cayman Marriott Beach Resort 
· CasaMagna Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa 
· St. Kitts Marriott Resort & The Royal Beach Casino 
· Frenchman’s Reef & Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort 
· Los Suenos Costa Rica Resort 
· Renaissance St. Croix Carambola Beach Resort & Spa 
· San Juan Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino 
· JW Marriott Panama Golf & Beach Resort 
· Atlantis Paradise Island, Autograph Collection Hotel 
Use booking code 3CL when making your reservation. Jet landing over Maho Beach in St. Maarten. © Takashi Ota/CC by 2.0 7. Unleash the Summer in St. Maarten 
Here's a Caribbean travel offer you don't even have to pay for: enter the ' Unleash the Summer Sweepstakes' sponsored by St. Maarten and Jet Blue Getaways and you may be one of 10 winners of a vacation getaway for two. Enter now thru Aug. 1 at www.vacationstmaarten.com/#/hot-deals.php for a three-night stay at your choice of: Oyster Bay Beach Resort ( www.oysterbaybeachresort.com ) Sonesta Great Bay Resort ( www.sonesta.com/geatbay ) Sonesta Maho Beach Resort & Casino : ( http://www.sonesta.com/mahobeach ) Sonesta Ocean Point Resort ( www.sonesta.com/oceanpoint ) Westin Dawn Beach Resort ( www.westinstmaarten.com ) 
Winners will receive on-island airport transfers as well as a sightseeing tour. In addition, four grand prize winners will receive roundtrip flights for two courtesy of JetBlue Getaways.
